languages.text: {n}Судя по выражениям лиц спорщиков, один действительно рад был бы отправиться на покой, а другой — служить целую вечность.{/n}
{n}Judging by the expressions of the two debating priests, you can easily believe that the one would indeed welcome his long-awaited rest, and the other a chance at eternal service.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Судя по выражениям лиц спорщиков, один действительно рад был бы отправиться на покой, а другой — служить целую вечность.{/n}

languages.text: {n}从两位牧师的表情判断，你不难看出，年迈的牧师渴望得到永恒的安息，而年轻的牧师则渴望能够永远侍奉帝皇。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by the expressions of the two debating priests, you can easily believe that the one would indeed welcome his long-awaited rest, and the other a chance at eternal service.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}从两位牧师的表情判断，你不难看出，年迈的牧师渴望得到永恒的安息，而年轻的牧师则渴望能够永远侍奉帝皇。{/n}

languages.text: {n}議論を交わす二人の司祭の表情を見る限り、一方はようやく訪れる安息を心から望んでおり、もう一方は永遠の奉仕の機会を喜んで受け入れるだろうということを、容易に信じられた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by the expressions of the two debating priests, you can easily believe that the one would indeed welcome his long-awaited rest, and the other a chance at eternal service.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}議論を交わす二人の司祭の表情を見る限り、一方はようやく訪れる安息を心から望んでおり、もう一方は永遠の奉仕の機会を喜んで受け入れるだろうということを、容易に信じられた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}A juzgar por las expresiones de los discrepantes sacerdotes, tienes la certeza de que uno de ellos agradecería su merecido descanso y el otro la oportunidad de servir eternamente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by the expressions of the two debating priests, you can easily believe that the one would indeed welcome his long-awaited rest, and the other a chance at eternal service.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A juzgar por las expresiones de los discrepantes sacerdotes, tienes la certeza de que uno de ellos agradecería su merecido descanso y el otro la oportunidad de servir eternamente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tartışan iki rahibin ifadelerine bakılırsa birinin gerçekten uzun zamandır beklenen istirahatini, diğerinin ise sonsuz hizmet şansını memnuniyetle karşılayacağına kolayca inanmak mümkün.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by the expressions of the two debating priests, you can easily believe that the one would indeed welcome his long-awaited rest, and the other a chance at eternal service.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tartışan iki rahibin ifadelerine bakılırsa birinin gerçekten uzun zamandır beklenen istirahatini, diğerinin ise sonsuz hizmet şansını memnuniyetle karşılayacağına kolayca inanmak mümkün.{/n}

languages.text: {n}À en juger par l'expression des deux prêtres en plein débat, vous n'avez aucun mal à croire que l'un d'eux accepterait volontiers un repos bien mérité et l'autre une chance de servir pour l'éternité.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by the expressions of the two debating priests, you can easily believe that the one would indeed welcome his long-awaited rest, and the other a chance at eternal service.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À en juger par l'expression des deux prêtres en plein débat, vous n'avez aucun mal à croire que l'un d'eux accepterait volontiers un repos bien mérité et l'autre une chance de servir pour l'éternité.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Angesichts des Gesichtsausdrucks der beiden debattierenden Priester fällt es dir leicht, zu glauben, dass der eine seine wohlverdiente Ruhe und der andere eine Chance auf ewige Dienstbarkeit begrüßen würde.{/n}
